member.param: The source data being passed to the target.
The of data expected by the target dependency property.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.

member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The of data expected by the source object.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.

member.name: T:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Common.GridSplitterCollapseMode
member.summary: Specifies different collapse modes of a ExtendedGridSplitter.

member.name: F:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Common.GridSplitterCollapseMode.None
member.summary: The ExtendedGridSplitter cannot be collapsed or expanded.

member.name: F:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Common.GridSplitterCollapseMode.Next
member.summary: The column (or row) to the right (or below) the splitter's column, will be collapsed.

member.name: F:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Common.GridSplitterCollapseMode.Previous
member.summary: The column (or row) to the left (or above) the splitter's column, will be collapsed.

member.name: T:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Common.CollapsableGridSplitter
member.summary: An updated version of the standard ExtendedGridSplitter control that includes a centered handle which allows complete collapsing and expanding of the appropriate grid column or row.

member.summary: Handles the property change event of the IsCollapsed property.

member.summary: Handles the property change event of the CollapseMode property.
member.param: The new value for the CollapseMode property.

member.summary: Collapses the target ColumnDefinition or RowDefinition.

member.summary: Expands the target ColumnDefinition or RowDefinition.

member.summary: Indicates that almost no power savings measures will be used.

member.summary: Indicates that fairly aggressive power savings measures will be used.

member.summary: Indicates that very aggressive power savings measures will be used to help stretch battery life.

member.name: T:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Controls.CoverFlow.PlaneProjector
member.summary:
PlaneProjector - dead simple interactive 3D in WPF. Read more at http://blogs.msdn.com/greg_schechter/archive/2007/10/26/enter-the-planerator-dead-simple-3d-in-wpf-with-a-stupid-name.aspx
Greg Schechter - Fall 2007

member.name: T:SciChart.Examples.ExternalDependencies.Controls.CoverFlow.PlaneProjector.LayoutInvalidationCatcher
member.summary: Wrap this around a class that we want to catch the measure and arrange processes occuring on, and propagate to the parent PlaneProjector, if any. Do this because layout invalidations don't flow up out of a Viewport2DVisual3D object.
